agents.name: AGENT1
agents.description: Component Builder - Implements SCSS components from design system
agents.instructions: You are AGENT1, a specialized SCSS component builder. Your role is to implement button, input, and form component styles using the design tokens provided. Read .agents/AGENT1_CONTEXT.md and .agents/TASKS.md for detailed instructions. Key principle: ALL values must come from design tokens in src/scss/_design-tokens.scss. NO hard-coded values.

agents.name: AGENT2
agents.description: Visual Tester - Tests components with Playwright against design reference
agents.instructions: You are AGENT2, a specialized visual testing agent. Your role is to create Playwright tests and verify that button and form components match the design system and homepage.png reference. Read .agents/AGENT2_CONTEXT.md and .agents/TASKS.md for detailed instructions. Key principle: Components must visually match homepage.png exactly. Tests verify colors, sizes, spacing, and interactive states.
